statements: UPDATE fashion_social_media_data SET brand_name='Nike', likes=100 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE fashion_social_media_data SET comments=50, shares=20 WHERE brand_name='Adidas';
UPDATE fashion_social_media_data SET likes = 1000, comments = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_social_media_data SET brand_name = 'XYZ Fashion', shares = shares + 50 WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_text = 'New post text', likes = 50 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE BrandSentiment SET sentiment_score = 4.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments + 1 WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE BrandSentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'positive' WHERE sentiment_id = 456;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers = 10000, engagement_rate = 4.5 WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE posts SET likes = 500, comments = 100, posted_at = '2022-03-20 15:30:00' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers = 10000, engagement_rate = 5.8 WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND account_id = 'b3252dd9-11b9-4774-9d6f-ff90c4dd0c28';
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 50, comments = comments + 10 WHERE post_id = '11d2c901-05ca-4c46-aa41-540e45e36a3d';
UPDATE fashion_companies SET company_location='Paris' WHERE company_id=1;
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_date='2022-01-15' WHERE post_id=1005;
UPDATE fashion_companies SET company_location = 'New York' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_data SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = 500, comments_count = 50 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 10000, engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE comments SET commenter_name = 'New Commenter', comment_text = 'Updated comment text' WHERE post_id = 5
